mapper.select: select id, nickname, date, src, description, detailInfo, clincID, userID from MedicalExaminationFile where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into MedicalExaminationFile(nickname, date, src, description, detailInfo, clincID, userID) values (#{nickname}, #{date}, #{src}, #{description}, #{detailinfo}, #{clincid}, #{userid})

insert into MedicalExaminationFile(nickname, date, src, description, detailInfo, clincID, userID) values
(#{entity.nickname}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.src}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.detailinfo}, #{entity.clincid}, #{entity.userid})

insert into MedicalExaminationFile(nickname, date, src, description, detailInfo, clincID, userID) values
(#{entity.nickname}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.src}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.detailinfo}, #{entity.clincid}, #{entity.userid})
on duplicate key update nickname = values(nickname), date = values(date), src = values(src), description = values(description), detailInfo = values(detailInfo), clincID = values(clincID), userID = values(userID)
mapper.update:
update MedicalExaminationFile
nickname = #{nickname},
date = #{date},
src = #{src},
description = #{description},
detailInfo = #{detailinfo},
clincID = #{clincid},
userID = #{userid},
where id = #{id}
